column2: Movies that scared the hell out of me
column3: horror, opinions no one asked for, scary movies
column5: Movies that gave me a good scare. Whether or not I thought the movie was “good” is another story. I tried my best to rank them, but I found these scary for different reasons so it became difficult. Some rely on jump scares, some are just extremely unsettling and made me want to sleep with the lights on.
